title: Arcane Absorption Dagger
content:
see a man's severed head held over the jug, filling it with beads of blood.

Dagger Light Finesse Thrown

Arcane Absorption Dagger is one of the Dagger Weapons in Baldur's Gate 3. The Arcane Absorption Dagger features a leather grip adorned with imagery of jugs. As the knife is rotated, the depiction shows an empty jug gradually filling. In BG3, each type of weapon has different ranges, damages, and other features (Finesse, Versatile, Dippable, etc.).
